trans-unit.source: Join a personal device to your organization| Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Join a personal device to your organization| Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A topic that explains how users can register their personal Windows 10 computers to their corporate network.
trans-unit.target: A topic that explains how users can register their personal Windows 10 computers to their corporate network.

trans-unit.source: Join a personal device to your organization
trans-unit.target: Join a personal device to your organization

trans-unit.source: To join a Windows 10 device to your organization
trans-unit.target: To join a Windows 10 device to your organization

trans-unit.source: From the Start menu, select Settings.
trans-unit.target: From the Start menu, select Settings.

trans-unit.source: Select Accounts, and then click Your account.
trans-unit.target: Select Accounts, and then click Your account.

trans-unit.source: Click Add Work or School account, and then type in your organizational account.
trans-unit.target: Click Add Work or School account, and then type in your organizational account.

trans-unit.source: You will then be taken to the sign-in page for your organization.
trans-unit.target: You will then be taken to the sign-in page for your organization.

trans-unit.source: Enter your username and password and click OK.
trans-unit.target: Enter your username and password and click OK.

trans-unit.source: You will then be prompted for a multi-factor authentication challenge.
trans-unit.target: You will then be prompted for a multi-factor authentication challenge.

trans-unit.source: This is configurable by IT.
trans-unit.target: This is configurable by IT.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD will then check whether this user/device requires mobile device management (MDM) enrollment.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD will then check whether this user/device requires mobile device management (MDM) enrollment.

trans-unit.source: Windows will then register the device in the organization’s directory in Azure AD and enroll it in MDM.
trans-unit.target: Windows will then register the device in the organization’s directory in Azure AD and enroll it in MDM.

trans-unit.source: When this is done, if you are a managed user, Windows will wrap up the setup process and take the user to the desktop through the automatic sign-in screen.
trans-unit.target: When this is done, if you are a managed user, Windows will wrap up the setup process and take the user to the desktop through the automatic sign-in screen.

trans-unit.source: If you are a federated user, you will be taken to the Windows sign-in screen and have to enter your credentials.
trans-unit.target: If you are a federated user, you will be taken to the Windows sign-in screen and have to enter your credentials.

trans-unit.source: Additional Information
trans-unit.target: Additional Information
